name: Black Diamond Crack Gloves
description: The protection and performance of a tape glove, without waste. Slide on these gloves to protect your hands from gobies or add a little friction to smooth splitters. The white colour helps reflect heat so you won't slip around in the summer heat.Synthetic suede is durable and provides a snug, secure fit.0.6mm rubber film for grip without bulk.Low profile Hypalon strap.
